video1.title: Why clarity beats motivation
video1.description: You don't need more willpower. You need a clearer path forward.

transcript.line1: Most of us wake up believing we lack willpower...
transcript.line2: When what we actually lack is a clear path forward.
transcript.line3: Every day, your brain makes thousands of micro-decisions. By the time you sit down to work on what matters, your decision-making capacity is already depleted.
